name: virginal
content:
virginal adjective
(NO SEX)
Add to word list
Add to word list
never having had sex: He falls deeply in love with the virginal Isabella. Their belief is that a young virginal bride can best be shaped into a dutiful wife.
by, of, or relating to a virgin (= someone who has never had sex) or virgins: He was referring to the virginal conception of Jesus, which is described in the Gospels of Mathew and Luke. virginal innocence/modesty/purity
virginal adjective
(NOT SPOILED)
extremely clean and not spoiled in any way: A cool mountain breeze was keeping the air almost virginal. The newly laid concrete drive stretched pale and virginal up the side of the house.
